Q_DESC: Assume that the program has overloaded functions to perform average of given number. The first accepts two integers, second accepts three arguments, fourth accepts four arguments and calculates the average of given numbers
TESTCASE_1:
10
20
30
40
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of 2 nos is 15
Average of 3 nos is 20
Average of 4 nos is 25
TESTCASE_2:
5
15
10
30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of 2 nos is 10
Average of 3 nos is 10
Average of 4 nos is 15
TESTCASE_3:
25
35
30
70
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Average of 2 nos is 30
Average of 3 nos is 30
Average of 4 nos is 40
